name siteid
description A site ID
in path
required True

name ruleid

in path

summary Get an advanced rule
description blockcallout

  type danger
  body This is an alpha API call and should be considered very unstable Please do not execute this in a production environment See our versioning guidelinesdocversioning for more information

/block
responses
200
wafGetAdvancedRuleResponse
type object
wafAdvancedRule
type object
properties
id
type string
description An advanced rules ID
name
type string
description An advanced rules name
source
type string
description A CEL syntax expression that contains the advanced rule’s conditions
wafAdvancedRuleAction
type string
default ACTIONUNSPECIFIED
description The actions that the WAF takes when an advanced rule is triggered

 ACTIONUNSPECIFIED The action is undetermined
  BLOCK The WAF blocked the request
  ALLOW The WAF allowed the request
  CAPTCHA The WAF presented the user with a captcha
  HANDSHAKE The WAF performed automatic browser validation
  MONITOR The WAF monitored the request but took no action
enabled
type boolean
format boolean
description Whether or not an advanced WAF rule is enabled
wafAdvancedRuleStatusCode
type string
default STATUSCODEUNSPECIFIED
description A custom HTTP status code that the WAF returns if a rule blocks a request
actionDuration
type string
description How long a rules block action will apply to subsequent requests

Durations only apply to rules with block actions
description
type string
description A rules description
AdvancedRuleExecutionPhase
type string
default EXECUTIONPHASEUNSPECIFIED
description The WAF request/response phase for applying the advanced rule

 EXECUTIONPHASEUNSPECIFIED The phase to apply an advanced rule is unspecified
  ACCESS The advanced rule applies to request phase request headers and body available
  HEADERFILTER The advanced rule applies to response headers phase
  BODYFILTER The advanced rule applies to response body phase
description An advanced WAF rule applied to a site

Unlike predefined policies advanced rules are provided by the user for flexible WAF functionality
description The results from a request to retrieve an advanced WAF rule
